TopicTitle: Can't accept while customizing new game start

Articles.Content:
Using 1.3.1, I have a long list of mods.  When I try to start a new game and edit the advanced start configuration, the scroll box that contains the mod list does not limit to the size of the window but extends far past the bottom of the screen.  I can drag and move the window but not far enough to get to the Accept/Cancel buttons.  Besides uninstalling mods, are there any fixes or ways to toggle the buttons for this?

 

Spoiler

Looks like an oversight, the devs may not have anticipated that so many mods would add custom config options.

Best thing to do is to report this with that screenshot in the KSP bug tracker (after checking if it hasn't been reported already).

I am having the same problem, and it's a rather significant one in my opinion, as the only way (that I can find) to get out of the settings window is to close KSP completely down. and restart. Given that it takes my old machine a good 20 minutes to start he game, that is something of a game killing bug. Any idea how to get out of the settings window using the keyboard?
I haven't been able to find a way.  I have removed some mods that I didn't need to change settings on, created the game, then added them back in.
